title: 客户端
author: 空冥
txt_content: 一般一个客户端啥都没加的应该是都有什么文件夹

replies.author: 焚书坑儒
replies.txt_content: 仅包含.minecraft文件夹，下含assets、libraries与versions文件夹，望最佳答案

replies.author: XCVBN
replies.txt_content:
我正版启动器安装后有:
game
runtime
tools
MinecraftLauncher
nativelog

replies.author: XCVBN
replies.txt_content:
XCVBN 发表于 2017-2-2 12:46
我正版启动器安装后有:
game
runtime
MinecraftLuncher是启动游戏的
nativelog是个文本文档

replies.author: Jiang_de
replies.txt_content:
最精简的客户端只有
assets(资源文件)
libraries(游戏库文件，游戏引擎等核心文件)
version(版本文件)
